name: flame in the sky
description:
I present to you my first Unity Engine game, made for 2-color, 48H game jam, where themes were: "You are the weapon" and "Space".

I didn't have time to test, so feel free to comment on any bugs or shortcomings.

mouse - move

left click - shoot

right click - aim

Gameplay tips:

- Go left to refill ammo and buy weapons

- I made guns a bit to expensive - sorry about that :P going to fix it in after jam version

- Ammo is your hp, if it drops to 0 then you die

- If you die while aiming then it bugs out and you cant play, try to avoid that
